name: Plantly
tag_list: finance, diversify, saving, save, ira, investing, invest, investment
overview:
Plantly is a new breed of online investment advice service that helps everyday Americans find a better place for their hard-earned cash. They are part of a new movement of start-ups that want to see a better breed of financial tools come out of their city NY.

Plantly offers top-notch investment plans that accommodate a wide range of needs. We guide our customers to their perfect plan by revealing important and objective information that traditional advisors do not disclose. Our simple interface is devoid of obscure numbers or defensive fine print. To remain utterly objective, we help our customers implement their investment with any broker they choose. All of this is done entirely online.

Our proprietary technology enables us to bring these higher standards to everyday Americans at an affordable price. This is augmented by our uncompromising desire to provide everyday Americans with new-found control over their personal finances.
